becomePartner.title: Unlock your business potential with our B2B wholesale platform
becomePartner.listItem1: Gain special access to renowned brand electronics at competitive rates
becomePartner.listItem2: Optimize your supply chain through our B2B platform

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.paragraphText1: We are specialized in electronics wholesale and can deliver products from numerous global brands
aboutUs.paragraphText2:
Apple, Samsung, Dyson, Xiaomi, Huawei, Sony - you choose, and we deliver!
Since our establishment in 2016 in Ukraine and 2024 in Spain, our extensive experience has allowed us to perfect our quick delivery process and form valuable partnerships.

description.paragraph1: Introducing our revamped B2B sales platform, tailored to enhance your sourcing and purchasing process for consumer electronics.
description.paragraph2: Whether you're in the market for products from Apple, Samsung, or hunting for exclusive deals and discounts, we're here to assist.
description.paragraph3: Don't let this chance to expand your business and avail of our distinct offers slip away.
description.paragraph4: Upon registration, you'll be granted access to explore our product catalogue, manage orders, and track shipments.

signupModal.text: Registration successfully completed! Check your mail.

info.text1: Legal address: c. Arquimedes 43, 28946, Fuenlabrada, Madrid, Spain
